Name: Roasted Fowl
Description: Marinated game fowl roasted in the oven and served with rice and slaw.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Aves de caza marinadas asadas al horno y acompañadas de arroz y repollo.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 양념하여 오븐에 구운 새고기에 밥과 양배추 샐러드를 곁들였다.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Marinade de gibier de volaille rôti au four et servi avec du riz et du chou cru.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Marinált vadmadár hús rizzsel és káposztasalátával tálalva.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 腌制好的飞禽送入烤箱烤制，配合米饭和卷心菜沙拉食用。
